name: LightontheHill
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: light on the hill
des:
The Light on the Hill Radio Ministry is committed to communicating the good news of Jesus Christ throughout the world. We do this through the teaching ministry of Pastor James Kaddis. 

Once enabled, you can listen to the most recent episode by saying, "Alexa, play Light on the Hill"

To pause or resume any episode, say "Alexa, pause" or "Alexa, resume." To listen to previous episodes, say "Alexa, play the previous episode." If you want to know the title of an episode while the episode is playing, say "Alexa, ask Light on the Hill for the title of this episode." If you want to know the air date of an episode, say "Alexa, ask Light on the Hill for the date of this episode."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
